item.title: yIGF.TW Fourth Online Meetup
item.description: The meetup is scheduled for October 11, 2024, at 20:30 (Taipei time). Detailed meeting information is as follows: https://nus-sg.zoom.us/j/86416652352?pwd=pIw458TZmQhuyBbAohh9NuSbPNDegV.1 The discussion will focus on the 2009 dispute between Taiwan and the International Organization for Standardization (ISO). We have also obtained relevant materials and the original court ruling from the Swiss Ministry of Justice. Contact Us If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at organizers@yigf.tw. Everyone is welcome to join!
